EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - EngineRE Migration - 2014.10.09.Email - Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: EngineRE Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: EngineRE Migration
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We are continually working towards improving the Tricentis Tosca Testsuite by streamlining and optimizing our product line. Because of this, we ensure that outdated functions are either regularly updated or replaced by new and enhanced products. In this regard, the following products will be marked for ‘end-of-life’ EOL with the upcoming release of Version 8.3.0. (scheduled mid October 2014):
- Web Service Engine 2.0 and XML Engine 2.0 (EngineRe) - Web Service Engine 1.0 and XML Engine 1.0 (Classic)
Both Web Service Engine 2.0 and 1.0 will be replaced by our new TBox technology, in order to enhance and increase functionality of Tosca Testsuite. In order to ensure a smooth migration process from EngineRe to our TBox technology in this webinar we will address the following topics:
- Short introduction to our new products - Migration from Web Service Engine 2.0 and XML Engine 2.0 - Ongoing support during this process - Q&A
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-enginere-migration-2014-10-09.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-enginere-migration-2014-10-09.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu Oct 9, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. CET
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
